"After Stargate Atlantis was canceled, the show's co-creators began working on the already conceptualized Stargate Universe which the network had approved to have a bigger budget, be less mythology dependent, and have more focus on character development."

That's just a fancy way of saying SciFi wanted Stargate Galactica. Be careful what you ask for, you might just alienate fans of the most successful SciFi show of all time and create an unwatchable and soon-to-be-canceled show.
